Summarize the following resume:

Lahore, Pakistan

Facial Emotion Detection System | Python, Machine Learning, OpenCV, TensorFlow, Keras, CNN March 2025
• Developed a real-time intelligent system capable of analyzing facial expressions and detecting emotional states in

real-time from live webcam input with 62 percent accuracy

Airbnb Clone | MERN Stack

December 2024

database integration via MongoDB Atlas and Mongoose

Responsive Portfolio Website | HTML,CSS,Javascript

October 2024

Book Reading Tracker | MERN Stack

September 2024

CRUD operations,and a minimal, intuitive UI

• Built secure RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, integrating MongoDB for real-time data management

Quranic Insights Website | MongoDB, Node.js

April 2023

• Built a full-stack web application to explore and manage Quranic content using Node.js and MongoDB
• Applied core database concepts like schema design, data modeling, and efficient query optimization
• Developed RESTful APIs for seamless data retrieval and CRUD operations

Ludo Game | Snake Game | Chess | Shogi | C++

February 2022

• Built a console-based Ludo-inspired game with unique gameplay rules using advanced OOP principles like

inheritance, polymorphism, and type casting

• Implemented game reload and restart features for improved user experience

Graphics media Intern
The Legal Archive

Lahore,Pakistan

Lahore, Pakistan

Frameworks: React, Node.js, WordPress
Developer Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Visual Studio, Linux, Fiji (ImageJ), Unity
Other Tools: Canva(Graphic Design), Video Editing, Medical Image processing

Here's a summarized version of Mahnoor Irfan's resume:

### Name & Contact
- **Mahnoor Irfan**
- 📞 +92322 4614565
- 📧 [mahnoorirfanhafeez@gmail.com](mailto:mahnoorirfanhafeez@gmail.com)
- LinkedIn: [mahnoorirfan22](https://linkedin.com/in/mahnoorirfan22)

### Education
- **Information Technology University**
  - Bachelor of Science in Computer Science - 6th Semester
- **Lahore Grammar School**
  - Alevels: Full merit-based scholarship - Both years
  - Olevels: 10A*s and As - High Achiever’s Award for academic excellence

### Experience
- **Graphics Media Intern, The Legal Archive**
  - Enhanced social media campaigns with creative graphics (June 2023 – August 2023)
- **Front-end Intern, Echno Gaming Solutions**
  - Part of a team that enhanced gameplay and GUI, increasing user screen retention by 12% (June 2022 – August 2022)
- **Social Media and Graphics Coordinator, Shaukat Khanum Internship Program**
  - Boosted social media engagement by 30% using video editing and graphic design (May 2021 – July 2021)

### Projects
- **Facial Emotion Detection System**
  - Developed a real-time system for detecting emotional states with 62% accuracy using Python, TensorFlow, and Keras (March 2025)
- **Airbnb Clone**
  - Implemented JWT authentication and developed RESTful APIs for property management using MERN Stack (December 2024)
- **Responsive Portfolio Website**
  - Integrated multi-language support and dynamic content using HTML, CSS, JavaScript (October 2024)
- **Book Reading Tracker**
  - Built a responsive React frontend for book management with CRUD operations (September 2024)
- **Quranic Insights Website**
  - Full-stack web application for managing Quranic content with efficient data retrieval (April 2023)
- **Console-based Games (Ludo, Snake, Chess, Shogi)**
  - Developed games using C++ with advanced OOP principles (February 2022)

### Technical Skills
- **Languages and Databases:** C, C++, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, MongoDB Atlas
- **Frameworks:** React, Node.js, WordPress
- **Developer Tools:** Git, GitHub, VS Code, Visual Studio, Linux, Fiji (ImageJ), Unity
- **Other Tools:** Canva (Graphic Design), Video Editing, Medical Image Processing

This summary provides a concise overview of Mahnoor's academic background, professional experience, technical projects, and skills.
